Color axis labels

Source: R/ggplot2-utils.R
map_axis_labels.Rd

Color axis labels

map_axis_labels(
  plt,
  label_data_x,
  label_data_y,
  aes_label,
  scale = ggplot2::scale_color_hue(aesthetics = "axis_color")
)

Arguments

plt

ggplot2::ggplot() object
label_data_y

data.frame()s containing the mapping between x-axis/y-axis labels and aes_label
aes_label

character or bare symbol giving the column in label_data to be mapped
scale

ggplot2 discrete color

Value

plt with axis text modified

Examples

require(ggplot2)
#> Loading required package: ggplot2
require(dplyr)
plt = ggplot(mpg, aes(x = manufacturer, y = drv)) + geom_jitter()
label_data = mpg %>% select(manufacturer) %>% unique() %>%
mutate(euro = manufacturer %in% c('audi', 'volkswagen'), drv = NA_character_)
map_axis_labels(plt, label_data, label_data, euro)
